metadata.title: CVE-2021-35196 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Manuskript through 0.12.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted settings.pickle file in a project file, because there is insecure deserialization via the pickle.load() function in settings.py. NOTE: the vendor's position is that the product is not intended for opening an untrusted project file.

criterions.comment: manuskript package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
